companyName: Anderson & Associates Law Firm - Tulsa, OK

moreBlocks.lawyersAtAnderson&AssociatesLawFirmSelec: • Anderson, Lynn R. On a Super Lawyers® List

description:
From our office in Tulsa, Oklahoma, attorney Lynn Anderson and the dedicated legal professionals at the Anderson & Associates Law Firm provide invaluable advocacy and support to clients across our region who suffered a serious injury or lost a loved one due to someone else's negligence or wrongdoing. Along with all types of personal injury and wrongful death claims, we also handle estate planning and business law, and our law firm has become one of Tulsa's premier legal practices for individuals, families and business owners in need.

A native of Tulsa, Mr. Anderson has a genuine concern for the legal challenges that affect the members of our community. He has more than 27 years of total legal experience to help you make the best informed decisions as we work aggressively to secure the favorable outcomes you expect and deserve efficiently and cost-effectively.

Over the course of our history, we have gained a reputation for the personalized attention we provide to all we serve, which means you can rely on us for wise, compassionate and trustworthy counsel as well as an unwavering commitment toward helping you achieve your goals. Whether inside or outside the courtroom, we are ready to fight for your rights and entitlements. As evidence of our success and dedication to those we serve, our law firm has received countless testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

To find out more about how we can best serve your needs, you can contact the Anderson & Associates Law Firm to schedule a free initial consultation. We also currently offer virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy.
